title: Setup Testing Environment
description: Configure the necessary testing tools and frameworks.

title: Write Unit Tests
description: Develop unit tests for core modules.

title: Perform Integration Tests
description: Execute integration tests to verify component interactions.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
description: Invite users to test the system and provide feedback.

title: Review Test Results and Fix Bugs
description: Analyze test results, identify bugs, and implement fixes.

title: Prepare Test Report
description: Document the entire testing process and its outcomes.
